content: you will love this easy crochet lacy shell scarf pattern it creates a light lacy scarf with a lovely drape that is very easy to adapt to a different size or yarn this is my favourite type of accessory pattern - worsted weight yarn cake quick to crochet and a relaxing stitch repeat row the pattern is beginner-friendly and uses a simple crochet stitch pattern to create a beautiful and versatile scarf that can be worn all year round **measurements** scarf pictured measures 82in 208cm long and 11in 28cm wide after blocking and before fringe is added
